description:
I want to be able to initiate a change of name process from the processes page,
          via the person page
          So that I can complete a legal change of name for a person
name: As an internal Hackney User

elements.name: AC1 - CoN Process through 'Request Documents electronically' - APPROVE Application

steps.name: I am logged in
I am on the MMH home page
I enter "za" as search criteria
I select 'Person' and click on search button
I am on the Person search results page for "za"
I select person
I click on 'New Process' button
I select 'Changes to a tenancy' from the processes menu
a further sub menu is expanded into view
I select 'Change of Name' to initiate the change of name process for the selected person
'Change of Name' page is displayed
Start Process button is disabled
I select the checkbox 'I have explained to the tenant'
Start Process button is enabled
I select the button
Change of Name edit page is displayed
Next button is disabled
Status Stepper is at "Tenant's new name"
I select Title and enter First and Last name
I click on Next button
I am on the supporting documents page
Status Stepper is at "Request Documents"
I do not confirm the Tenant declaration checkbox and I click on Next button
Tenant declaration validation message is displayed
I select Request Documents electronically and click on Next button
'Review Documents' page is displayed
Status Stepper is at "Review Documents"
I select only the first option to confirm I have seen all the documents
I click on Next button
a validation error message is displayed
I select all the checkboxes to confirm I have seen all the documents
I click on Next button
I am on the 'Tenure Investigation' page
Status Stepper is at "Submit case"
I select Submit case button
I am on the 'Next Steps' page
Status Stepper is at "Finish"
I click on 'Continue' button
I am on the Review Application page
Status Stepper is at "Review application"
I recommend the outcome as 'Approve'
I select 'I confirm that the tenure investigation has been completed'
I click on 'Confirm' button
I am on the 'Tenure investigator recommendation: Approve application' page
I select the option 'I have passed the case to the Area Housing Manager'
I select decision as 'Approve'
I confirm 'I confirm that this is an instruction received by the Area Housing Manager'
I click 'Confirm' button
a validation error message for AHM "You must enter manager's name" is displayed
I enter Area Housing Manager name as 'Test Housing Manager'
I click 'Confirm' button
I am on the HO and AHM approved page
I select the Case activity history button
I click Close activity history button
I am on the HO and AHM approved page

elements.name: AC2 - Tenure Investigator APPROVE the Application and HO or AHM DECLINE the Application

steps.name: I am logged in
I am on the MMH home page
I enter "za" as search criteria
I select 'Person' and click on search button
I am on the Person search results page for "za"
I select person
I click on 'New Process' button
I select 'Changes to a tenancy' from the processes menu
a further sub menu is expanded into view
I select 'Change of Name' to initiate the change of name process for the selected person
'Change of Name' page is displayed
Start Process button is disabled
I select the checkbox 'I have explained to the tenant'
Start Process button is enabled
I select the button
Change of Name edit page is displayed
Next button is disabled
Status Stepper is at "Tenant's new name"
I select Title and enter First and Last name
I click on Next button
I am on the supporting documents page
Status Stepper is at "Request Documents"
I select Request Documents electronically and click on Next button
'Review Documents' page is displayed
Status Stepper is at "Review Documents"
I select all the checkboxes to confirm I have seen all the documents
I click on Next button
I am on the 'Tenure Investigation' page
Status Stepper is at "Submit case"
I select Submit case button
I am on the 'Next Steps' page
Status Stepper is at "Finish"
I click on 'Continue' button
I am on the Review Application page
Status Stepper is at "Review application"
I recommend the outcome as 'Decline'
I select 'I confirm that the tenure investigation has been completed'
I click on 'Confirm' button
I am on the 'Tenure investigator recommendation: Decline application' page
I select the option 'I have passed the case to the Area Housing Manager'
I select decision as 'Approve'
I confirm 'I confirm that this is an instruction received by the Area Housing Manager'
I enter Area Housing Manager name as 'Test Housing Manager'
I click 'Confirm' button
a modal dialog box is displayed
I am on the HO and AHM Declined page

elements.name: AC3 - Field Validation error messages for Title, FirstName and LastName

steps.name: I am logged in
I am on the MMH home page
I enter "za" as search criteria
I select 'Person' and click on search button
I am on the Person search results page for "za"
I select person
I click on 'New Process' button
I select 'Changes to a tenancy' from the processes menu
a further sub menu is expanded into view
I select 'Change of Name' to initiate the change of name process for the selected person
'Change of Name' page is displayed
I select the checkbox 'I have explained to the tenant'
I select the button
Change of Name edit page is displayed
I enter Title only
I click on Next button
a validation error message for 'First name' and 'Last name' are displayed
I enter 'Title' and 'First name' only
I click on Next button
a validation error message for 'Last name' is displayed
I enter 'Title' and 'Last name' only
I click on Next button
a validation error message for 'First name' is displayed
I enter 'First name' and 'Last name' only
I click on Next button
a validation error message for 'Title' is displayed

elements.name: AC4 - CoN Process through 'Make an appointment to check supporting documents'

steps.name: I am logged in
I am on the MMH home page
I enter "za" as search criteria
I select 'Person' and click on search button
I am on the Person search results page for "za"
I select person
I click on 'New Process' button
I select 'Changes to a tenancy' from the processes menu
a further sub menu is expanded into view
I select 'Change of Name' to initiate the change of name process for the selected person
'Change of Name' page is displayed
Start Process button is disabled
I select the checkbox 'I have explained to the tenant'
Start Process button is enabled
I select the button
Change of Name edit page is displayed
Next button is disabled
Status Stepper is at "Tenant's new name"
I select Title and enter First and Last name
I click on Next button
I am on the supporting documents page
Status Stepper is at "Request Documents"
I select 'I have made an appointment to check supporting documents' and click on Next button
'Review Documents' page is displayed
'Office appointment scheduled' message box is displayed

elements.name: AC5 - Close case at Review Documents stage

steps.name: I am logged in
I am on the MMH home page
I enter "za" as search criteria
I select 'Person' and click on search button
I am on the Person search results page for "za"
I select person
I click on 'New Process' button
I select 'Changes to a tenancy' from the processes menu
a further sub menu is expanded into view
I select 'Change of Name' to initiate the change of name process for the selected person
'Change of Name' page is displayed
Start Process button is disabled
I select the checkbox 'I have explained to the tenant'
Start Process button is enabled
I select the button
Change of Name edit page is displayed
Next button is disabled
Status Stepper is at "Tenant's new name"
I select Title and enter First and Last name
I click on Next button
I am on the supporting documents page
Status Stepper is at "Request Documents"
I select 'I have made an appointment to check supporting documents' and click on Next button
'Review Documents' page is displayed
'Office appointment scheduled' message box is displayed
I click on Close Case button
modal dialog is displayed with 'Reason for close case'
I enter the reason and I click on Close case button
'Review Documents' page is displayed with message 'Change of name application will be closed' and reason
I select checkbox to confirm outcome letter and I click on Confirm button
'Thank you for your confirmation' message is displayed
I select the Case activity history button
I click Close activity history button
'Thank you for your confirmation' message is displayed
